titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation appointing the time when His Maiesties subiects may attend to be cured of the disease, commonly called, the kings euill.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at His Maiesties Palace at Hampton Court this three and twentieth day of September, in the tenth yeere of the Reigne of our Souereigne Lord Charles by the grace of God King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, Defender of the Faith, &c."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and
